title: Results for ruti translation from Spanish to English
author: Wikipedia
description: Contextual translation of "ruti" into English. Human translations with examples: rüti.
cleaned_text: From professional translators, enterprises, web pages and freely available translation repositories. la ruti ® es una novedosa vacuna poliantigénica para el tratamiento de la infección tuberculosa latente. the rut i® is a new polyantigenic vaccine for the treatment of latent tuberculosis infection. it is produced from mycobacterium tuberculosis fragmented into tiny particles and detoxified in order to eliminate the toxic substances produced by the bacillus. el objetivo de este ensayo clínico es demostrar que los individuos vacunados con la ruti® tienen menos riesgo de desarrollar la enfermedad que los individuos no vacunados. the aim of this clinical trial is to show that patients treated with the ruti® vaccine have a lower risk of developing the disease than individuals that have not been vaccinated. con su equipo ha alcanzado objetivos importantes como la obtención de la autorización de laboratorio farmacéutico y la ejecución de los ensayos clínicos de fase i y de fase ii de la vacuna ruti®. isabel amat and her team have achieved important goals including pharmaceutical laboratory accreditation and phase ii clinical trials of theruti®vaccine. a finales de los años 90 empezó a asesorar a archivel technologies, s.l. , socia fundadora de archivel farma , como consultora externa y en octubre del 2.008 se incorporó al "staff" de archivel farma como directora financiera, ocupando asimismo el puesto de vice-secretaria del consejo de administración. ha participado en levantar distintas rondas de financiación de la compañía y ha negociado con distintos organismos públicos la obtención de préstamos para afrontar las necesidades de desarrollo de la vacuna ruti ® . desde el mes de enero del 2.012 ocupa el puesto de directora general, cogiendo el relevo de su predecesor, d. luis ruíz Ávila. at the end of the 90s she began to advise archivel technologies, s.l. which was the precursor to archivel farma , as an external consultant and in october 2008 she became part of the archivel farma staff as chief financial officer, and at the same time vice-secretary of the board of directors. she has participated in fund-raising for the company and has also negotiated with different public organizations to secure loans to meet the development needs of the ruti® vaccine. since january 2012 she has been the chief executive officer of the
